hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # build only once. Source is from Access DB.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
### build only once. Source is from Access DB. cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors #php 726.php jenkins #OK step 1 ### generates 726.tar.gz
#php resource_utility.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "726_meta_recoded", "task": "metadata_recoding"}' #OK step 2 ### generates 726_meta_recoded.tar.gz
#php dwca_MoF_reassign_values.php _ '{"resource_id":"726_meta_recoded", "resource":"MoF_reassign_values"}' #OK step 3 ### generates 726_meta_recoded_01.tar.gz #php dwca_MoF_reassign_values.php _ '{"resource_id":"726_meta_recoded_01", "resource":"MoF_reassign_values"}' #OK step 4 ### generates 726_meta_recoded_02.tar.gz
#cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 #cp 726_meta_recoded_02.tar.gz 726_meta_recoded.tar.gz #ls -lt 726_meta_recoded_02.tar.gz #ls -lt 726_meta_recoded.tar.gz #rm -f 726_meta_recoded_02.tar.gz
# Update Zenodo record: working... OK # But better to check first before uploading to Zenodo. Thus commented but should work. cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors php update_Zenodo_record_using_EOL_resourceID_directly.php _ '{"resource_id":"726_meta_recoded", "zenodo_id":"13318232"}'
